headline: Apple Intelligence: Everything you need to know about Apple's AI model and services
summary: If you've upgraded to a newer iPhone model recently, you've probably noticed that Apple Intelligence is showing up in some of your most-used apps, like Messages, Mail, and Notes. Apple Intelligence (yes, also abbreviated to AI) showed up in Apple's ecosystem in October 2024, and it's here to stay as Apple competes with Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, and others to build the best AI tools. headline: AI wasn't the focus of Apple WWDC. Here's why.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Apple’s WWDC Was ‘Underwhelming.’ Why Some Analysts Still Say Buy the Stock.

Last year, Apple used this event to showcase Apple Intelligence—its highly anticipated artificial intelligence software—for the first time.

headline: Apple's upgraded AI models underwhelm on performance
summary: Apple has announced updates to the AI models that power its suite of Apple Intelligence features across iOS, macOS, and more. But according to the company's own benchmarks, the models underperform older models from rival tech firms, including OpenAI. summary: At the end of the WWDC 2025 keynote address on Monday, the company literally sang its praises to app developers, as singer-songwriter Allen Stone humorously turned customers' positive App Store reviews into song lyrics for a tune titled "6 out of 5 stars." headline: Apple WWDC: Liquid Glass redesign is a 'feather in Apple's cap'
summary: Apple (AAPL) unveiled the new Liquid Glass software redesign, its sweeping updates to its operating systems across devices, at WWDC 2025. IDC Research director of mobile devices and AR/VR, Ramon Llamas, joins Morning Brief to discuss the significance of the software refresh and the lack of artificial intelligence (AI)–related announcements, as well as what they signal about the iPhone maker's strategy. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: May CPI, US-China trade talks, Apple's AI plans: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) are above their flatlines in Tuesday's pre-market trading ahead of May's Consumer Price Index (CPI) due out tomorrow, Wednesday, June 11. President Trump characterized trade talks with Chinese officials as "not easy" as the Trump administration negotiates export controls and rare earth minerals with the rival superpower. iPhone maker Apple (AAPL) seemingly underwhelmed investors with its AI announcements at its 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) on Monday. headline: Apple Fails to Clear a Low Bar on AI
summary: A program to allow developers to access its “foundation models” was widely expected and could—over time—result in AI apps that work more easily on Apple’s devices.  Apple’s share price, down 19% already this year, slipped further on Monday following the keynote.  Apple no doubt wanted to avoid the trap it fell into last year, when it introduced its Apple Intelligence service to great hype only to have its later launch and subsequent updates fall short of promises.

headline: Warren Buffett Has 23% of Berkshire Hathaway's Portfolio Invested in 2 AI Stocks Up 600% and 900% in the Last Decade
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has nearly 23% of its portfolio invested in two artificial intelligence stocks, Apple and Amazon.  Apple’s foray into AI has yielded disappointing results, but opening its large language models to developers could help the company monetize the technology.  Amazon is deploying AI tools and products across its retail and cloud computing businesses, and Morgan Stanley views the company as an underappreciated leader.

headline: Think You Know Apple? Here's 1 Little-Known Fact You Can't Overlook.
summary: Apple has billions of active devices across the globe, which has helped drive revenue of its budding services segment.  The combination of hardware, software, and services make up Apple’s powerful ecosystem.  It hasn’t happened yet, but Apple's push into AI could improve its overall financial picture.

headline: Best $3 Trillion Stock to Buy Right Now: Apple, Microsoft, or Nvidia?
summary: Apple lacks the growth to outperform Nvidia or Microsoft.  Microsoft's cloud computing division will propel it higher, but other divisions are holding it back.  Nvidia's massive growth is unheard of for a company of its size.

headline: Apple vs. Amazon: Which Warren Buffet AI Stock Is the Better Buy Today?
summary: Buffett loves Apple's sticky ecosystem of consumer products, but Apple is expensive today.  Amazon's AI business presents massive opportunties, and the company's stock is trading at an attractive price.  Two of the top AI companies today are also two of the stocks in the Berkshire Hathaway portfolio.

headline: Heard on the Street: Warner Discovery Splitting Up

headline: 苹果iOS 26重大更新一览：液态玻璃、Visual Intelligence和其他亮点
summary: 你的iPhone系统即将改头换面。苹果公司iOS 26将推出“液态玻璃”(Liquid Glass)操作系统设计，这是多年来最大规模的一次视觉革新。《华尔街日报》科技作家Joanna Stern带你一览在苹果全球开发者大会(WWDC 2025)官宣的重大更新。封面图片制作：Paige Money
